price: If you reject [the message], so did many nations reject before you. The duty of the Messenger is only to deliver the message clearly[5].”
arabic: وَإِن تُكَذِّبُواْ فَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ أُمَمٞ مِّن قَبۡلِكُمۡۖ وَمَا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ
footnotes: [5] It is either the continuation of the words of Abraham or Allah’s words given as a comfort to the Prophet (ﷺ).

meta.transliteration: wa-in tukadhibū faqad kadhaba umamun min qablikum wamā ʿalā al-rasūli illā al-balāghu al-mubīnu
